jaws.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the mouth of a person or animal, especially a dangerous animal
jaws.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the two parts of a machine or tool that move together to hold something tightly
jaws.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: (1975) an exciting and frightening US film made by Steven Spielberg, about a shark (=a large dangerous fish) that kills people who go swimming in the sea and then tries to kill a group of men who go out in a boat to catch it
